      • validMove

        public abstract java.lang.Boolean validMove(int oldRank,
                                            int oldFile,
                                            int newRank,
                                            int newFile,
                                            Board board)
        checks to see if move from current position to new position is valid
        Parameters:
        oldRank - current rank of Piece
        oldFile - current file of Piece
        newRank - new rank of Piece
        newFile - new file of Piece
        board - gameboard
        Returns:
        true if move is valid, false if move is not valid
